Title: They're Just My Friends
Writer: Charles Messina, Patrick Nwamu, Punchin' Pat Nwamu
Actors: Malik Yoba, Louis Vanaria, Al Snow, Lord Jamar
Plot: Pat Black is a late twenties boxer produced by the streets of the Bronx. When his father dies, he spends his time finding community in all the wrong places. It isn't until his friends land ...
